comments.comment: pewdiepie is a real example of we made the right person famous
the pewds arc is a disney story. The Goat.
40 minutes with marzia’s cozy editing style, we’re being spoiled
The fact Felix retired graciously and lives dream
Björn looks so much like his papa but I think he has his mama’s sense of humor. He’s always giggling at her ️
It just feels so wholesome to watch Bjorn grow up with our beloved pewds
Marzia's editing and camerawork remind me of a fairytale. Its so wholesome and peaceful. I really appreciate the work she does on these vlogs.
sometimes i tend to forget how blessed i am to live in Switzerland. Seeing your shots truly makes me realize how beautiful it is and that i should do more outdoor activities.
Grew up watching this man screaming in the dark, a decade later im watching his happy little family under the bright sky

This is surreal. I'm a nighttime Securityguard in Lucerne and i regularly do my rounds where you were wandering around with björn. I would have not believed my eyes if i had run into you on one of my rounds.
Glad you guys enjoyed your stay in our beautiful city. Cheers
let’s talk about have Marzia Left youtube years ago, but she always comes back to edit these vlogs in the same way she would her old youtube videos . Thank you girl. We miss u lots here️

I respect this. 

I've became a first-time father recently (a little girl), it was a total transformation in my life, this little baby is taking everything from me, my energy, my sleep, my money, my peace!... but yet ... I can't imagine my life without her. 

As an egoistical, self-centered, workaholic prick, she took every trace of all that nonsense and showed me how to share myself in the most cruel-some but beautiful way.  It's a kind of love that can't be described, an absolutely transcending experience.
As someone we grew up and lives in Switzerland, it always takes visiting another country to realize how beautiful home is.
Welcome to Switzerland. ️🇨🇭It was a pleasure having you guys with us! 🫶

Man it’s so nice to see somebody who handled all the fame and attention so well at a young age.
Pewds is one of the right people that the internet made successful
i love how pewds still appreciate everything and still grateful even if the weather does not favor him
You and your family deserve all the happiness in the world. Björn will have a wonderful childhood.
Marzia is so wonderful. She takes such good care of Björn, deals with Felix’s dramatic self AND makes homemade matcha tiramisu  And her editing is beautiful.

If you were to tell me 10 years ago that Felix would start a family, and raise a whole generation, I’d believe you, because I’ve been here the whole ride. It’s nice to see the uploads, but it’s nicer to see that he’s healthy and happy. That’s all that matters. Thank you Felix for the years you have given.
From cynycism to sincerity is like a glow-up of the soul. Thank you for being a wholesome role model for a generation raised by the internet.
21:30 "Björn likes the elevator " turns the camera to the most upset looking child Ive ever seen
Björn is so big now  May you guys be happy forever and thank you for letting us see him grow, just like we saw you grow

Marzias editing of those memory vlogs is one of the most sensual things on this platform. The sound, the shots, the transitions. Really gives you that feel of a cherished memory, same time of nostalgia, but also living in the moment and enjoying every bit of it. And I am sure all these memory capsules will be lovely and tear enduring to watch after 10-20 years.
These videos feel so good to watch, i feel like this is the perfect family experience, seeing this is soooo magic.
I am part Swiss and Switzerland is easily one of my favourite countries of all time - I’ve basically been around the entire country at this point. I’m glad you went and had a good time

40:20. The way he chuckles at the pictures of Bjorn squinting is too cute. 
Felix and Marzia are such good parents and they are making so many good memories with Bjorn and for him to look back on when he is older and has kids of his own one day.
Lucerne is beautiful and I definitely want to visit there when I get the chance.
Love seeing Felix and his family enjoying themselves!! So beautiful and wholesome 🥹
Seeing you in Lugano, my hometown... wow. You guys are a dream came true. We can feel the love in your frames, the true beauty of a family. A big hug.

Pediatric OT here! If you want better core strengthening for sweet Bjorn while he sits, try the upseat! It puts the hips and spine in correct alignment and engages the trunk while sitting. I’ve noticed you have a seat that’s similar to the old style bumbo which has been repeatedly shown to delay strength and coordination due to the leg positioning and cutting off the need to use tummy/back muscles. I think in the states they had to redesign because a lot of babies were getting hip problems with it. The newer model bumbo is safer, but your seat looks like the older version and I’m not sure how other countries are regulating these baby seats. It’s not bad if used infrequently, but I always recommend the upseat vs the bumbo. Much better for babies! 

I had my little girl in March last year, so I’ve loved seeing Pewds and his family grow and enjoy life at the same time as my own 🩵.

It feels so surreal to see pewds in lugano at a park where i used to go to school, recognized the excact spot of the thumbnail literally in half a second.
Sometimes i forget just how blessed i am for being able to live in such a place.

Him going the wrong way to the elevator just to go on a "short hike" with slippers on then revealing that he is infact on a intermediate mountain trail 20:50 is peak comedy and also how tourists go missing or worse in Switzerland. But as a local it really gave me insight. 

Please never go unprepared and inform yourself about the different markings on trails and what they mean.

I can't explain it but Pewds looks so much like a Swedish dad now
I know he is but he REALLY looks like it
Marzia always looks so pretty. She's like a Studio Ghibli main character.  Björn is getting so big now. Crawling and chitchatting. He's adorable.
I come back to Pewds every few weeks or months and its like checking in on an old friend. Glad to see you guys happy and Bjorn is a beautiful baby

Pewdiepie is the youtuber that goes through everything as a Youtuber: the drama, controversial, apology, reaction, gaming, tv commercial, buying stuff online, you laugh you lose, reviewing food, and finally vlog. Pewdiepie get all the achievement in Youtube honestly. Thank you Felix, you were my daily routine to watch after school, but now I'm and working adult, had stuff other going on, cannot watch youtube much as before. And by watching your videos now, I can remember how I was back then, its weird but special as the same time. Anyway, thank you for everything.
Never been interested in pewdiepie content before, but i'm enjoying his climbing and family content now. Bro's living my dream

Currently going through a toughest very terrible year of my life from start to almost end but it feels nice to escape once in a while watching the adventures of Felix and his family across Japan or abroad.
I'm glad Felix is still sharing bites of his life with us. So happy for them all.
